entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
